POE Loot Filters

FilterBlade-compatible filters with sound pack support

ℹ️

Installation Guide:

  1. Choose a filter below and click to open in FilterBlade
  2. Customize the filter if desired (optional)
  3. Download the filter file from FilterBlade
  4. Place filter in: Documents/My Games/Path of Exile
  5. If using custom sounds, place sound files in the same folder
  6. In-game: Go to Options → Game → Select your filter

Racing Filters

TyTyKiller Racing Filters

Optimized filters for speedrunning and racing

by TyTyKiller

Balormage Progression

Softcore progression filters from league start to pinnacle

by Balormage
